website_summaries.verdict: Although it doesn't offer all the features of some others, this kitchen set still manages to deliver all the class on a smaller scale and with a lower price. A great pick if you're on a budget or have limited space.
pros: Modern design gives it a grown-up feel that appeals to serious little chefs
Complete with all-important features like an oven, microwave, fridge, sink, light-up stove top, cabinet, and shelves
Smaller footprint doesn't take up much floor space
Good size and height gives kids plenty of room to grow
Comes with essential accessories like storage bins, utensils, and cookware
cons: Assembly can be tricky without pre-drilled holes

customer_reviews.title: Nice space saving kitchen for the kiddos
customer_reviews.text: Best part about this kitchen is the storage and it's size. For how thin it is it can store a lot of fake foods, which is great. It doesn't stick out from the wall much at all and it offers all the bells and whistles of the bigger wood ones. Building it was a breeze. If you don't have a power drill, it will be way more work for 2 reasons: 1. You have to put in about 40 screws, a lot of them are 1.5 inches. 2. Most of the screw holes are NOT pre-drilled, so using a basic screwdriver would be extremely difficult I believe. Buy a Ryobi!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours on Amazon reading reviews looking for the best toy kitchen set. And I have to say this is the best one I saw. Not too many pieces nor too hard to put together for assembly. The features such as the turning knobs, the boiling sound effects for the pot and pan, and the faucet nozzle turning sounds made it seem very realistic to a 13 month old. Our son absolutely loves to watch us cook and little did we know just how much he was taking in. He LOVES this. If you're stuck like we were, on which kitchen set to pick, this is a great one to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy and solid
customer_reviews.text: I’m a dad so the hardest part was following the directions and waiting till the last minute to put it together. Once I got raging and yelling about not having anymore girls. It was easy just following the directions and you’ll be fine also you’ll need a power drill makes everything easier since it’s all plastic.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy in the house!
customer_reviews.text: My babies love it! It's their favorite toy they love putting things in and taking things out of the shelves and the oven. I purchased the $16 pack of food with it. Great little play kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Shell c.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable.
customer_reviews.text: At 99 dollars, it's probably a little overpriced for other comparative kitchens because some come with more accessories, however this one is a great height, very well made and it shipped to my location :) I'd recommend this to a friend, it's the typical high quality you expect from Step2 and I love that the colors are so neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, cute kitchen
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this kitchen; both play at it nicely together (ages 6 and 2). Kitchen isn't bulky at all--sleek and modern. We love it! Easy assembly too.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Seate-beck

customer_reviews.text: I ordered a new product, but I got a product with traces of it being used by someone... And There was not enough parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cook It Up
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this kitchen. I had been looking for kitchen tall enough that he wouldn't have to bend over while "cooking" since he's tall for a four year old and this is perfect. The little stove top lights up and it comes with a few accessories. The only down side was that it would be difficult to assemble for someone that doesn't have a power drill and an iron grip. Also, the hooks for the utensils are very hard to snap in. I've had it for about 4 weeks now and had my husband try several times, but still can't push them in. Other than this, I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: My kids (4 and 7) both love this little kitchen set and played with it for hours the first couple of weeks we had it. It’s compact enough for our little house but holds a ton of pretend food neatly. Also I can’t say enough great things about Step 2 customer service. Our set was missing the little door on the upper cabinet so I called the morning we opened it to get a replacement. The rep was so friendly, professional, and quick! She was an absolute pleasure to talk to and got the correct part out to us overnight. Highly, highly recommend Step 2.
customer_reviews.author: KitVonDTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Falls down easy
customer_reviews.text: If not loaded with sand in the base it falls over if a child pulls on it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as my toddler's main Christmas present only to discover on Christmas day during assembly that the product was damaged. There were mutiple cracks on the fridge door. I will update review if it's made right, but a big disappointment for Christmas. Update: Product was replaced, however some parts were missing from the new set and the base was a bit bowed. Ended up being a fun toy, but only after loads of effort.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but a pain to put together
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality product. I've tried other kitchens and some of them didn't look like they'd hold up well. The plastic on this one is smooth, unlike some other companies that have a very rough and unpleasant surface. I know that sounds crazy but it's a thing. It's a fun and compact toy. You just need an evening to put it together. If you have an electric screw drill I'm sure it'll go more smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Yehuda Safier

customer_reviews.title: Missing fridge handle
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to get this for our son for his present from Santa but when my husband went to put it together the night before, it was missing the fridge handle. Which our son noticed immediately. Then when I went to call their customer service number to see if we could get them to send it, it said I was caller number 45 and had to hang up due to having to go back to work. Other then that, it is a nice fridge and our son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...Not sturdy. Poor quality. Small.
customer_reviews.text: What we like is that it is cute and kids love it. Takes a while to put together. The two guys that put this together didn’t notice until it was together that the Step 2 embossed logo on front top was upside down. Also it is not sturdy and will fall over if not secured to wall. Didn’t send back because the child it was gifted to loves it! Smaller than expected. Should have been better quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: MMS

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids but nightmare assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kitchen set for my kids as a Christmas gift and they both love it! My daughter is 4 and my son is 1 year old and they both enjoy playing with it! The assembly however was a nightmare. I used a screwdriver to put in all the screws and it took me few hours to put it together. Although the manual instructs on where to put the screws, there’s no actual holes for them. You have to make the holes by screwing te screws in yourself. Other than the assembly, I consider this kitchen set a great buy for kids ages 1-6.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Was the Perfect Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what the photo looked like. Was perfect size for my grandkids to share. One is 1Yr & the other is 4Yr Old. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Kobylinski

customer_reviews.title: Lovely play kitchen for children
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my grandchildren for Christmas they really love it it’s really nice. I did not put it together my daughter did. So I cannot speak on the ease of assembly. I Have severe balance issues and Unfortunately I lost my balance and fell on the kitchen,and broke the shelf on the side of the kitchen. So the kitchen is no longer safe to play on /with. It is a very sad situation because my grandchildren love the kitchen I personally felt it was a thing of beauty It is very very sad that the kids can no longer pretend cook
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I love how tall this kitchen is. My child doesn’t have to squat or sit to play. I had difficulty putting the hooks (that hold the utensils) in. I was bending the plastic and even tried a hammer to get them to pop in. No luck. They’re kinda just hanging on for dear life. It’s pretty sturdy, and the glass pieces are pretty solid as well. I like that you can see in the little fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: As far as kiddo toys go, this was fairly simple. Followed instructions—must use a electric drill for fast work. Hubby did the assembly as I read and handed him the pieces. Took less than 15 mins and was ready for Christmas morning. I do wish the stickers came applied to the parts. But that rarely happens on the plastic toys.
customer_reviews.author: paula elaine givens

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Kids Playset
customer_reviews.text: My great-grandson absolutely LOVED the kitchen fridge. He played with it all day on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Roys

customer_reviews.title: The color is wonderful!  Cute!
customer_reviews.text: The main problem is that I bought one from the Amazon Market Place for a few dollars less, and when I opened the box, there were screws loose everywhere. There were two sets of directions so I know the box had been messed with. However, once assembled, it was really cute and our grands love playing with it. They especially love the sounds the burner makes when the little pot is placed just right. A bit rocky but that can be fixed with some rubber strips.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Thinker

customer_reviews.title: not as cute
customer_reviews.text: Not as colorful and cute as the other play kitchens I've ordered but does have lots of features for the size: Refrigerator, oven, one burner that lights up, etc. Lots of assembly required. Lots of plastic. Fairly sturdy and my granddaughters love it
customer_reviews.author: Edith Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Very fun kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Very cute kitchen set..now we just need to order play food. I will give it five stars bc my daughter loves playing with the kitchen and it’s as we anticipated. Only bad part is you need a drill for the screws bc the holes are not predrilled. Also the package was a day late and that was disappointing but didn’t know till 8pm that the package wasn’t coming on time.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverCouple

customer_reviews.title: Use two people and you are good to go
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this product. The areas that needed to be screwed in were indicated as such and it was simple to put together. You will need two people to put this together in most instances but could manage with one. Would suck though...
customer_reviews.author: armando

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition. Husband put it together in less than 2 hours. Sturdy enough that doors and buttons can be used without worry of tilt or rocking base. My 18 month old loves playing with this and i am sure this will last her well over 4 years of age and more with playing time. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: MSCP

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a large box w not too many pieces. Instructions were clear and easy ish to follow. I'm terrible when it comes to putting things together, but was able to do it w my drill in a little under 2hrs. My 2 yr old daughter is absolutely in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Q.

customer_reviews.title: ... trying to get them to send one for a easy install but haven't herd anything back
customer_reviews.text: we were missing a door and trying to get them to send one for a easy install but haven't herd anything back yet
customer_reviews.author: Rodney M.

customer_reviews.title: Modern and good for taller toddlers too
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and modern looking. It took about 1 hour and 45 minutes to assemble with an electric screw driver and two Phillips head screwdrivers, longer and shorter to reach some angles better. Our tall toddler will be able to use for at least a few more years!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: My little guy loves his kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute kitchen for a 2 1/2 yr old! I was able to put it together by myself using a hand screwdriver in just over an hour. If you had a drill it would go much faster (and you wouldn't be sore --there are 20 long screws to screw in!). The only downfall is there is only enough settings (plate, cup, utensil, mug) for one--not sure if you can purchase more. T
customer_reviews.author: Janice Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Get a better quality Kitchen... this ones boring and cheap.
customer_reviews.text: This item was only good because it looks like a little kitchen but my 2 and 5 year old were bored of it within days and within a few weeks tossing it around as it is pretty lightweight. Ours was also missing two main pieces including the entire sink. Had to call and get replacements that were sent to me within 2-3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: These things are always a pain to put together but so worth it. I bought this for my son’s 2nd birthday and it’s a hit! I did a lot of research before settling with this kitchen. Worth the price and perfect size for him to use for the next few years.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Picture is much nicer than the real product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t look as beautiful as on the picture. It’s a middle quality product so the price is expensive for it
customer_reviews.author: Angy

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 year ols
customer_reviews.text: Baby girl loves got for her second bday. She cooks all the time i did purchase food to go along with this it dosent come with any.
customer_reviews.author: Amesome

customer_reviews.title: lots of playtime fun
customer_reviews.text: purchased this for our 20 month old grandtwins as a gift. They have already spent many hours playing with it. It is wonderful to have a toy that will grow along with their imaginations
customer_reviews.author: Jill S.

customer_reviews.title: My two year old granddaughter is going to be a Chef!!!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old granddaughter is the cutest! She mimics her momma cooking! Except, she substituted rocks for food! Haaahaaa! She has all her pots and pans and makes us a gourmet dinner every night! She’s very happy with her kitchen! Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gramabear

customer_reviews.title: My little granddaughters and grandsons love it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren really enjoy playing with this kitchen set. It’s modern and its neutral color goes with any room decor. It’s a perfect size for any room.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 1 and 7 year olds!
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this! It’s the perfect size for my 1 year old and 7 year old to play with. I ordered this one specifically because it was taller. This is by far the most played with toy in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Howard

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 2 and up. Very sturdy, well made. For the price its so smart and affordable. You will need to buy food for it but good quality for the price. Easy to assemble but you will need a drill
customer_reviews.author: re0916

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to get hooks to snap in all the way. I took a screw and made the holes a little bigger before I could finally force them in. Set is a little lightweight, my 1yr old pulls it over frequently, but it has held up to the play/abuse of two 3yr toddlers and the 1yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda

customer_reviews.title: Great For Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: Took my husband and I about an hour to assemble. Did it on Christmas Eve. I feel it’s okay but it wobbles, so it isn’t very sturdy. I love the look of it. The pieces came scratched up but none of it was too bad. It’s a great little kitchen. Does not come with play food.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bongiorno

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging, sub par condition.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it was the manufacturer or the shipping handler, but there are several places in which it was dented, making it nearly impossible to assemble. There's also a long scratch on the side by the refrigerator that I had to sand down so the 2-year-old this is intended for doesn't get scratched. It's cute, and I'm not denying that, but it came in terrible condition.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Comfort

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Kids Love it. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Love this kitchen. Perfect for my 3y/o and 1y/o with potential to last a few years until they both grow out of it. Cite accessories. My husband had no issue assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Missing plastic in refrigerator and oven and no decals very disappointed. The contact number has been busy every time I call.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete Item delivered
customer_reviews.text: Just received the Downtown Delight Kitchen and a ton of pieces are missing, all the handles and accessories are all missing. Kitchen looks good but disappointed we had so many pieces missing.
customer_reviews.author: Dave V

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen to fit in room
customer_reviews.text: Fits against the wall in a small area. Has storage containers that help to hold the dishes. Good kitchen for toddler. It is sturdy and made well as you would expect with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi P

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This play kitchen is really nice my child loves it it was somewhat easy to put togeather the instructions were very good and easy to follow but the holes for the screws in the plastic were not cut out so I had to use a power screwdriver so it is definatly a 2 person job but once it is all finished it is very strudy I would buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: George F.

customer_reviews.title: 44 screws
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our granddaughter and she seems to love it. The only issue we have is listening to the complaining of my son-in-law that they were 44 screws. Get over it!
customer_reviews.author: LoSo

customer_reviews.title: Love the neutral colors
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old loves his play kitchen. I love the many compartments and the neutral colors. My boys can be rough but so far this kitchen has held up and stayed standing. It is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: ceryn smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it overall
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my toddler. My only complaint is there are no predrilled holes when made assembly a bit difficult for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Tunnell

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is a pain
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2 year old's birthday. Missing parts and no screw holes, you need to make all your own holes and it was a pain to do. "Insert screw at 90 degree angles. My daughter loves it but not a fun project and I need to call on Monday to get the missing parts
customer_reviews.author: Derek S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love for my granddaughter! She loves it and plays with it constantly. Made out of very good material very durable
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Overall ok
customer_reviews.text: This set is great, but many of the pieces (hooks, etc) are to be pushed in designated holes and it is near impossible. Five adult family members tried and we ended up having to throw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your little one
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, she will play at it for at least an hour at a time which is really hard to get children to do especially a 1 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Payne Hard Wood

customer_reviews.title: Tough to assemle, but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This took me two hours to assemble (there were no pre-made holes for the screws, and I had no power drill. I HIGHLY suggest using a drill. ) My kiddo loves it though!
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter’s 2-year birthday. She is obsessed with it. Love the color, since it’s more neutral and looks nice in the playroom.
customer_reviews.author: lrl5899

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have a decently tall 1.5 and 4yr old, this kitchen is perfect height, I love the noise features on the stove top. We were in the market for a wooden one then I decided plastic would last longer with rough boys, and if they wanted to use real water in the sink it wouldn’t ruin it. Put it together in under and hour and it’s easily one of their favorite Christmas gifts this year.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea C.

customer_reviews.title: Drill is a must!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely needed a drill to get the screws in and a second pair of hands to hold the kitchen up while drilling. Took over an hour to put together but went quicker once we got the hang of it. My 2 yo granddaughter loves her kitchen! Very creative play time.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Vahedi

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to have a power drill otherwise worth the money and my kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fascianella

customer_reviews.title: Kids will enjoy for hours
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy product and easy to assemble. Kids will play with for hours. Well w ot rth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Travel Guru

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little kitchen for my grandson.
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my 24 month grandson and he loves it. Pots an pans are included, however, pay food must be purchased separately. One reason I purchased this kitchen is because if it somehow tumbles over it is not as heavy or cumbersome as similar play kitchens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!
customer_reviews.text: A great play kitchen; was easy to assemble and my kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diana E

customer_reviews.title: Good value, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: All three grandsons liked this and couldn’t wait to show it to me
customer_reviews.author: kebls

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this as a Christmas present. She loves it. It’s the perfect size for her, she’s 3.
customer_reviews.author: Ami Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but I suggest having a small drill, putting it together with your hands is doable but a little tough.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dent

customer_reviews.title: Good Kitchen Set
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! It’s fairly easy to put together and it very durable. Only problem with set up was trying to add the batteries, the screwdriver needed was not a standard size, super small. Looks nice and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Warnick

customer_reviews.title: It took about 2 hours to get it all put  together
customer_reviews.text: I put it together myself... with a drill. It was a great hit with my granddaughter, She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't take up alot if space.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it. Not too bulky. Accessories are a good size gir small hands.
customer_reviews.author: texmexnnc

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was missing two pieces, the footing/base and an additional piece. Very disappointing, for my granddaughters third birthday. Not pleased
customer_reviews.author: D. Turner.

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved, super cute and perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this kitchen! It's slim enough to fit close to the wall. The fridge is spacious and it's cool you can see inside all the appliances. I did order extra place settings and plastic food. The bins are small but they do fit the items the kitchen came with plus a couple extra little things.
customer_reviews.author: john holm

customer_reviews.title: No Instructions or Decal
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with no assembly instructions or stickers, and the oven has no plastic cover. It also came with a big bag of screws, but I can't find a single screw hole??? So the components keep coming apart really easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little kitchen! Love the neutral colors and all the extras it comes with. The only downside in my opinion was how hard some of the pieces were to pop into place. Some pieces also required additional screws for sturdiness. Overall very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s the Perfect size for our play room! My two year old & 6 year old love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Strydom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I like this play kitchen its gender neutral and its does not take too much space in my kids bedroom. Perfect for a girl and a boy.
customer_reviews.author: Anomg

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Great gift, shipped quick, easy to assemble and is sturdy. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: CLVanAmburg

customer_reviews.title: Step2 Downtown Delights Kitchen Kids Playset, Gray
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size kitchen and well-made! My little one loves it and plays for hours! Worth the price and is sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it especially the sound of the stovetop
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my niece for her birthday and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Cinthia

customer_reviews.title: Have a drill for assembly
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this toy; it functions well and is a great size. I must say, the assembly was a monster, my hands hurt after. It’s a very sturdy plastic for sure... Would’ve been easy with a drill I would assume, but I had one screw driver in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar Gail Johnston

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit.
customer_reviews.text: This is my sons favorite thing to play with. He’s 2 and it’s perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany R.

customer_reviews.title: Cute Little Play Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than I thought but compact doesn’t take up too much space. I thought it was a good value because it came with some kitchen items. My granddaughter loves the noises and the lights on the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Digiovanni

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter just loves her kitchen play set. She spend lots of time at her kitchen. Until getting her kitchen she was always "helping" momma & NaNa in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie Schuh

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love the light up stove and how it makes cooking sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and item
customer_reviews.text: All around great product my 5 year old loved this
customer_reviews.author: natasha

customer_reviews.title: It’s not so bulky
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her kitchen!!! It’s so compact and slim, easy to fit in a space. Very modern look.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Eger

customer_reviews.title: It was on time & good price, easy to build
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the step2 delight play kitchen & I was very happy because I ordered it last minute and I received it before Christmas & nothing was damaged. It was easy to put together all pieces were there & the price was good!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie C

customer_reviews.title: Love the set, but it smells!
customer_reviews.text: The kitchen itself is great and my 18 month old loves it. But it has an awful overpowering smell of garlic to it! I’ve wiped it down multiple times with Mrs Meyers cleanse and it’s finally starting to fade. Not sure what that is all about!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need a drill to put it together.
customer_reviews.text: Socks to assemble. I couldn't do it but it would be a breeze with a drill or electric screwdriver
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great little play kitchen. Easy to put together. Looks fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Shelby G

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 year old & she loves it. Doesn’t come with food but I found a 150 piece food set on amazon for $20 so worth it
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: i just received my mascara today couldn’t wait to try it. The brush is flexible which makes it easy to apply. I don’t have very thick eyelashes so after applying I’m so happy you can see my eyelashes
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small space
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this, especially the sound of the stove. It's great for a small space too.
customer_reviews.author: Nimzo

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors, light weight, very easy to assemble. The electronic stovetop burner with lights and sounds is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this toy for my son's 2nd birthday. Lots to put together but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for price. Sturdy, easy assembly, not cheaply made. It's well worth the buy. My 7 year old daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Avinlea

customer_reviews.title: Great play kitchen for boys and girls
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen is perfect for boys and girls. Product quality is very good and easy to assemble. This is one of the best play kitchens in Amazon. Totally happy with my purchase and definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Saul Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson LOVES his kitchen!! ❤❤❤ He is 16 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Teresia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Well made, and Fun kitchen set
customer_reviews.text: Fun kitchen toy that’s well made. My toddler enjoys playing with this and it’s made well enough to pass along when he outgrows it.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Minor

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a 1 1/2 year old and he liked it a lot. The stovetop sounds were a hit.
customer_reviews.author: ANM

customer_reviews.title: Make sure everything is in box before assembling
customer_reviews.text: Love it,however, manufacturers forgot to put in a microwave door into box before shipping to us... Now I got to call them. Hopefully all goes well...
customer_reviews.author: Tiffaney

customer_reviews.title: No stickers in box
customer_reviews.text: Product is great but the box had no stickers to apply to set making it look very plain and strange.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

product_meta.title: Step2 Downtown Delights Play Kitchen | Kids Kitchen Playset | Kitchen Toy with Realistic Lights & Sounds, Gray
product_meta.description: Little culinary masters are sure to love the compact and modern design of the Downtown Delights Play Kitchen by Step2. Watch as your little one whips up their favorite meal on the pretend play stovetop burner or bakes some delicious cookies in the slate-style oven. Wash all over your dishes or produce in the spacious, farmhouse-style sink and store all of your play food or groceries inside the oversized refrigerator, complete with a premium preview window. Once playtime is over, you’ll be sure to clean-up quickly with the multiple storage bins and storage cabinets! This kitchen playset will keep your junior chef busy for hours to come! Made in the USA of U.S. and imported parts.
feature_bullets: Electronic stovetop burner with working lights and sounds!
Refrigerator and oven door feature look-thru preview windows for cooks to see what's inside!
Play kitchen features a modern-style Farmhouse sink with gooseneck faucet and handle
Faux-look 'Granite' countertop provides ample prep area for mini chefs
Kitchen Playset features loads of storage space in the oven, fridge, or the molded-in shelves
Play kitchen features an included 24-piece accessory set
